edu.neu.ccis.sms.dao.categories

Class CategoryDaoImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.neu.ccis.sms.dao.categories.CategoryDaoImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CategoryDao

    public class CategoryDaoImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements CategoryDao
    DAO implementation class for Category Entity bean; Provides actual implementations for all category entity related access methods
    Author:
    Pramod R. Khare, Swapnil Gupta
